question: German Pavilion CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: Swisstech Pavilion @ CES 2024 - S-GE
results.content: About CES 2024: Convening the industry. The entire tech community united in a digital experience for collaboration, networking and thought leadership. Global impact. A highly targeted audience of approx. 150'000 industry professionals from around the globe including buyers, media, investors and potential partners are expected to participate.
results.raw_content:
The International Trade Forum brings together internationally active Swiss SMEs and offers the ideal platform to discuss innovative approaches for an all-round sustainable business model and to exchange ideas.
Switzerland Global Enterprise is the official Swiss organization for export and investment promotion with offices throughout Switzerland and in 31 countries. Together with our partner network we support Swiss SMEs in their international business.
Swisstech Pavilion @ CES 2024
The global stage for innovation in consumer technology
The global stage for innovation in consumer technology
The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) has served as the proving ground for innovators and breakthrough technologies for 50 years – the global stage where next generation innovations are introduced to the marketplace, investors and experts.
CES 2024 in Las Vegas gives a global audience access to major brands and start-ups as well as the industry's most influential leaders and advocates.
About CES 2024:
Together with our swisstech Partners Presence Switzerland, Innosuisse, swissnex, digitalswitzerland and the Swiss Business Hub USA we will create a strong Swiss presence in Eureka Park (start-up area) and in the Global Pavilion area.
At CES, the companies are connected directly with potential business partners or are given the opportunity to speak in front of international investors and relevant partners.

Effective 1 January, Mayank Agochiya assumed the role of #president of FEV Asia. In this capacity, Mayank joins the global management board of #FEV.
Mayank, who started his career as a calibration #engineer in India and Japan, has more than two decades of experience in engineering and strategic #consulting in various roles around the world. Since he joined FEV in 2016, Mayank held various management positions in Korea, China and TÃ¼rkiye, most recently as #managingdirector of FEV Consulting in the U.S.
"We are pleased to have found the ideal candidate for the position of the president of FEV Asia in Mayank Agochiya. In addition to his professional expertise, he is very familiar with the different markets and cultures in the Asian region," said Patrick Hupperich, president and CEO of FEV Group.

The European Union is currently not â€œFit for 55â€�! Â When it comes to the self-defined target of reducing greenhouse gas emissions by at least 55 percent by 2030, particularly in the mobility sector, there is still a long way to go.
This is one of the key takeaways of the 7th international FEV Zero CO2 Mobility Conference in Berlin. At the beginning of last November, around 100 participants discussed at the Titanic Chaussee Hotel (TITANIC Hotels Berlin) about chances and approaches to still reach these important targets.
On the other hand, the good news is, that the necessary #technologies and #tools for a successful #mobilitytransition are in place with battery-electric and hydrogen-based applications. Now, it requires a reliable regulatory framework to enable the move towards emission-free mobility with planning reliability.
Visit our latest press release at https://lnkd.in/eRKxVRyP to find out more on the findings of our conference and learn more about the event, the speakers and the key conclusions!

FEV.io and Streetscope, Inc. develop safety assessment system for autonomous #vehicles
Our team at FEV.io has entered into a partnership with Streetscope, Inc. , a provider of innovative tools for assessing the safety of autonomous vehicles, in #ADAS/AD development. By using industry-unique quantitative #measurement methods, the development of Advanced Driver Assistance Systems will be significantly improved.
In particular, the early integration of the new Streetscope Hazard Measure â€“ SHMâ„¢, an innovative #tool from Streetscope, into the #evolution process will make the efficiency of safety measures measurable and thus assessable.
The partners will be showcasing their cutting-edge solution at the upcoming #ces2024 in #LasVegas. Visit us at booth #5577 and #FeelEVolution!
Further information can also be found in our press release: https://lnkd.in/eDSwkD43

TodayÂ´s "Woman in Motion": Burcu Ã–zbay from the Control, Safety & Autonomous Driving Department at FEV TÃ¼rkiye. The Technical Specialist for AI/ML & Connectivity is simultaneously working on her doctoral thesis in the field of #computationalengineering.
Â
Admittedly, she has not yet achieved her original childhood ambition of flying through the world on a #hoverboard like Marty McFly in "Back to the Future". Nevertheless, Michael J. Fox's role in the movie aroused young Burcu's curiosity at an early age in her desire to understand the world around her technologically.
After completing her #Bachelor's degree in Physics Engineering and a Master's degree in Computational Engineering, Burcu has developed into a Technical Specialist in the field of #digitalmobility and is working on her doctorate at the same time. Thanks to her deep technical expertise, Burcu represents FEV TÃ¼rkiye in the SELFY PROJECT, where her team is researching together with 15 partners from all over Europe, Asia and Australia to improve the security of future digital mobility ecosystems.
Â
For girls and women who are still unsure whether they want to pursue #STEM, Burcu has a clear recommendation: "Feel free to follow your passion. Go beyond the boundaries that are supposedly set by your environment."

How can the #profitability of #batterypowered #electromobility be increased? Our colleagues from FEV Consulting have undertaken comprehensive studies on the various levers of #economic and #ecologic #sustainability.
Find out more in the shared article below and contact Benjamin Knobloch, Hagen Wegner and Kevin Poch for further information!
#batterytechnology #circulareconomy #sustainability #consulting #pricing
8,170 followers
Battery-powered #electricvehicles must be profitable!
Reducing the cost of #batteries is an important factor in increasing your profitability. But with the right #pricing, you have an even greater potential!
And what role does #sustainability play?
Choosing the right cell is one of the most important factors for cost efficiency. In addition, there are many other technical solutions with different influences on the functional criteria, but also on costs, recyclability and the CO2 footprint.
With the appropriate #valueengineering effort, it is always possible to leverage potential.
But what about the right pricing?
What are your customers willing to pay for certain driving range and charging speed specifications?
Or for sustainable production?
Contact Benjamin Knobloch, Hagen Wegner and Kevin Poch with your questions on strategic costing, pricing, #circulareconomy & benchmark examples.

At #COP28 in #Dubai , around 70,000 people currently discuss how the 1.5 degree target can still be achieved. The focus is on the global stocktake, a review of the current situation with regard to achieving the 2015 #Paris #climatetargets.
The long-haul transport sector is accountable for around 6% of total COâ‚‚ emissions in the EU; with regard to the transport sector, this segment even contributes 25%.
In a response to those #challenges, FEV is collaborating with 36 other partners from 13 countries in the #EU-funded ESCALATE - Horizon Europe Project to develop #highlyefficient #electricpowertrains for #heavyduty applications. These are intended to be up to 10% more efficient than current designs and achieve #ranges of up to 800 km without the need of recharging. For the six-month trial operation, regular distances of at least 500 km are initially targeted.
Our colleague Dr. Thorsten Schnorbus had the pleasure to present this exciting project today in the Turkish pavilion at COP28.
For further information on #ESCALATE please visit the website https://lnkd.in/dbJ7JiUx
